Class ChangeMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • iteration2.ChangeMaker

  • public class ChangeMaker
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class ChangeMaker. Contains useful static procedural methods for making change and changing an integer number representing cents to a properly formatted string

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Makes change given paramets
      static java.lang.String toMoney(int cost)
      Transforms an integer number representing cents to a string formatted as "$*.XX" where * is the cost in dollars and XX is the cost in cents

    • Method Detail

      • makeChange

        public static boolean makeChange(int amountOfChange,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,com.vendingmachinesareus.CoinRack> coinRackMap,
                 CoinInventory inventory)
        Makes change given paramets
        Parameters:
        amountOfChange - the amount of change
        coinRackMap - a mapping of the cent value to CoinRack which holds the coins of that denomination
        inventory - Coin Inventory class for the machine
        Returns:
        true, if change was successfully made, false otherwise

      • toMoney

        public static java.lang.String toMoney(int cost)
        Transforms an integer number representing cents to a string formatted as "$*.XX" where * is the cost in dollars and XX is the cost in cents
        Parameters:
        cost - The amount of cents to be represented
        Returns:
        String in the form of $*.XX (example $430.42)
